name: Modbus Address
func:
msg.topic = 'output_velocity'
msg.payload = {
    'fc' : 3,
    'unitid' : 1,
    'address' : 8604,
    'quantity' : 1
}
node.send(msg)

msg.topic = 'motor_frequency'
msg.payload = {
    'fc' : 3,

}

name: Output Velocity
Motor Frequency
Motor Current
Voltage
Total Operating Time
func:
if(msg.topic == 'total_operating_time'){
    var data = msg.payload
    data = data[0]
    data = data.toFixed(2)
    msg.payload = parseFloat(data)
    global.set('total_operating_time', msg.payload)
    node.send(msg)
}

name: Overload Fault Duration
Speed
Acceleration Time (Display)
Deceleration Time (Display)
Acceleration Time
func:
var data = msg.payload
data = data / 100

msg.payload = data
node.send(msg)

name: Deceleration Time
func:
var data = msg.payload
data = data / 100

msg.payload = data
node.send(msg)

name: Acceleration Time (Read)
Deceleration Time (Read)
Inverter Data
Speed
func:
var data = msg.payload
var speed_setpoint = data
data = (data*2)/3
msg.payload = parseInt(data)
global.set('speed_setpoint', speed_setpoint)

node.send(msg)

return msg;

query: SELECT sr.id AS id, sr.class AS class, sc.class AS class_name, sr.date AS date, sr.time AS time FROM sorting_result sr JOIN sorting_class sc ON sr.class = sc.id ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 100;
